channel.title: Exchanges on TechnoStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Exchanges on TechnoStreet

item.title: Kraken Shutting Down Crypto Exchange in Japan Citing Weak Global Crypto Market
item.description: Kraken Shutting Down Crypto Exchange in Japan Citing Weak Global Crypto Market Cryptocurrency exchange Kraken is shutting down services in Japan.

item.title: Moneygram Enables Customers to Buy and Sell Cryptocurrency via Its Money Transfer App
item.description: Moneygram Enables Customers to Buy and Sell Cryptocurrency via Its Money Transfer App Moneygram has launched a new crypto service to allow customers to buy, sell, and store cryptocurrencies using its mobile money transfer app.
